data.title: Supply Chain Management
data.meta_description: At GXO, we are proud to be a diverse, inclusive, global workforce operating in a culture of respect and collaboration. We offer competitive pay and benefits,
data.meta_site_name: GXO | Supply Chain Management | 3PL Contract Logistics
data.text: __cf_bm30 minutesThis cookie, set by Cloudflare, is used to support Cloudflare Bot Management. Used to distinguish between humans and bots._GRECAPTCHA5 months 27 daysGoogle reCAPTCHA sets a necessary cookie (_GRECAPTCHA) when executed for the purpose of providing its risk analysis.CONSENT11 monthsCookie consent. We set this cookie to remember users’ consent preferences so that their preferences are respected on their subsequent visits to this site. It does not collect or store any personal information of the site visitors.cookielawinfo-checkbox-advertisement11 monthsRecords the user consent for the cookies in the "Marketing & Advertising" category. These are cookies set through our site by our advertising partners. They do not store direct personal information, but it's based on unique identification of your browser and or internet device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising.cookielawinfo-checkbox-analytics11 monthsRecords the user consent for the cookies in the "Analytics & customization" category. These are used to analyze how our site is used and how they are performing. For example, these Cookies track what pages are most frequently visited, and from what locations our visitors come from. These Cookies include, for example, Google Analytics cookies and also might provide you with the same customizations during future visits.cookielawinfo-checkbox-functional11 monthsRecords the user consent for the cookies in the "Performance & functionality" category.cookielawinfo-checkbox-necessary11 monthsRecords the user consent for the cookies in the "Essential" category. These Cookies are necessary to allow us to operate our Sites so you may access them as you have requested.cookielawinfo-checkbox-others11 monthsThe cookie is set by GDPR cookie consent to record the user consent for the cookies in the category "Others".cookielawinfo-checkbox-performance11 monthsRecords the user consent for the cookies in the "Performance & functionality" category.cookielawinfo-checkbox-preferences11 monthsRecords the user consent for the cookies in the "Preferences" category. These Cookies permit us to "remember" you in-between visits and provide you with the same customizations during future visits.CookieLawInfoConsent11 monthsRecords the default button state of the corresponding category & the status of CCPA. It works only in coordination with the primary cookie.rc::a11 monthsGoogle reCAPTCHA service. Used to track and analyze user behavior to distinguish humans from bots or automated software.rc::f11 monthsGoogle reCAPTCHA service. Used to track and analyze user behavior to distinguish humans from bots or automated software.trp_language11 monthsThis cookie is used for translation of the website (gxo.com, ethics.gxo.com)viewed_cookie_policy11 monthsThe cookie is set by the GDPR Cookie Consent plugin and is used to store whether or not user has consented to the use of cookies. It does not store any personal data._cfuvid30 minutesThe _cfuvid cookie is only set when a site uses this option in a Rate Limiting Rule, and is only used to allow the Cloudflare WAF to distinguish individual users who share the same IP address._clck11 monthsMicrosoft Clarity's cookies send non-personally identifiable information (Non-PII data, is simply data that is anonymous) about our users. Collects data on the user’s navigation and behavior on the website. This is used to compile statistical reports and heatmaps for the website owner._clsk1 dayMicrosoft Clarity's cookies send non-personally identifiable information (Non-PII data, is simply data that is anonymous) about our users. Connects multiple page views by a user into a single Clarity session recording. Registers statistical data on users' behaviour on the website._wpfuuid11 monthsThis cookie is used by the WPForms WordPress plugin. The cookie is used to allows the plugin to connect entries by the same user and is used for some additional features like the Form Abandonment add-on.ak_bmscsessionAkamai Bot Manager – Security cookie used by Akamai to optimize site security by distinguishing between humans and bots.aka_debugsessionThis cookie is set by the provider Vimeo. This cookie is essential for the website to play video functionality. The cookie collects statistical information like how many times the video is displayed and what settings are used for playback.CLID11 monthsClarity's cookies send non-personally identifiable information (Non-PII data, is simply data that is anonymous) about our users. Microsoft Clarity set this cookie to store information about how visitors interact with the website. The cookie helps to provide an analysis report.li_gc180 daysUsed to store consent of guests regarding the use of cookies for non-essential purposes. LinkedInlidc1 dayLinkedIn sets the lidc cookie to facilitate data center selection.visitor_id11 monthsThe visitor cookie includes a unique visitor ID and the unique identifier for your account. For example, the cookie name visitor_id12345 stores the visitor ID 1010101010. The account identifier, 12345, makes sure that the visitor is tracked on the correct business unit. The visitor value is the visitor_id in your business unit. This cookie is set for visitors by the Pardot tracking code.visitor_id-hash11 monthsThe visitor hash cookie contains the account ID and stores a unique hash. For example, the cookie name visitor_id12345-hash stores the hash “855c3697d9979e78ac404c4ba2c66533”, and the account ID is 12345. This cookie is a security measure to make sure that a malicious user can’t fake a visitor and access corresponding prospect information.__utma11 monthsThis cookie is set by Google Analytics and is used to distinguish users and sessions. The cookie is created when the JavaScript library executes and there are no existing __utma cookies. The cookie is updated every time data is sent to Google Analytics.__utmb1 minuteGoogle Analytics. To store time of visit.__utmc1 minuteGoogle Analytics. To store time of visit.__utmt1 minuteGoogle Analytics. To store number of service requests.__utmz1 minuteGoogle Analytics. To store used keyword and search engine._ga11 monthsThe “_ga” cookie is used to determine unique visitors to the site and it is updated with each page view. Additionally, this cookie is provided with a unique ID that Google Analytics uses to ensure both the validity and accessibility of the cookie as an extra security measure._ga_VD0YMJ4QF311 monthsThe “_ga” cookie is used to determine unique visitors to the site and it is updated with each page view. Additionally, this cookie is provided with a unique ID that Google Analytics uses to ensure both the validity and accessibility of the cookie as an extra security measure._gat_gtag_UA_192423568_11 minuteThis is a Google Analytics cookie which provides us with data on unique browser visits to our website._gat_UA-192423568-11 minuteA variation of the _gat cookie set by Google Analytics and Google Tag Manager to allow website owners to track visitor behaviour and measure site performance. The pattern element in the name contains the unique identity number of the account or website it relates to._gid1 dayThis cookie is installed by Google Analytics. The cookie is used to store information of how visitors use a website and helps in creating an analytics report of how the website is doing. The data collected including the number visitors, the source where they have come from, and the pages visted in an anonymous form._hjAbsoluteSessionInProgress30 minutesHotjar sets this cookie to detect the first pageview session of a user. This is a True/False flag set by the cookie._hjFirstSeen30 minutesHotjar sets this cookie to identify a new user’s first session. It stores a true/false value, indicating whether it was the first time Hotjar saw this user._hjIncludedInPageviewSample2 minutesHotjar sets this cookie to know whether a user is included in the data sampling defined by the site's pageview limit._hjIncludedInSessionSample_*2 minutesHotjar sets this cookie to know whether a user is included in the data sampling defined by the site's daily session limit._hjSession_*30 minutesHotjar. Collects statistics on the visitor's visits to the website, such as the number of visits, average time spent on the website and what pages have been read._hjSessionUser_*11 monthsHotjar. Collects statistics on the visitor's visits to the website, such as the number of visits, average time spent on the website and what pages have been read.AEC6 monthsPlaced by Google. Used to prevent spam, fraud and abuse. Ensures that requests within a browsing session are made by the user, and not by other sites.DV1 dayThese cookies are used to collect information about how visitors use the Site and use the information to compile reports and to help improve the Site. The cookies collect information in an anonymous form, including the number of visitors to the Site, where visitors have come to the Site from and the pages they visited. Google.JSESSIONIDsessionThe JSESSIONID cookie is used by New Relic to store a session identifier so that New Relic can monitor session counts for an application. LinkedIn use it for Cross Site Request Forgery (CSRF) protection and URL signature validation.langsessionLinkedIn sets this cookie to remember a user's language setting.ln_or1 dayLinkedIn sets this cookie to registers statistical data on users' behaviour on the website for internal analytics.lpv30 minutesThis LPV cookie is set to keep us from tracking multiple page views on a single asset over a 30-minute session. For example, if a visitor reloads a landing page several times over a 30-minute period, this cookie keeps each reload from being tracked as a page view.MR7 daysUsed by Microsoft's Clarity analytics service to check whether to refresh MUID.OTZ30 daysLinks activities of website visitors to other devices that are previously logged in via the Google account. In this way, advertisements are tailored to different devices.pardot11 monthsThe pardot cookie is set while the visitor is logged in as a Pardot user. The cookie indicates an active session and is not used for tracking.SMsessionUsed by Microsoft's Clarity analytics service to synchronise the MUID across Microsoft domains.sync_active11 monthsThis cookie is set by Vimeo and contains data on the visitor's video-content preferences, so that the website remembers parameters such as preferred volume or video quality.VISITOR_INFO1_LIVE180 daysA cookie set by Youtube to measure bandwidth that determines whether the user gets the new or old player interface.vuid11 monthsThis domain of this cookie is owned by Vimeo. This cookie is used by vimeo to collect tracking information. It sets a unique ID to embed videos to the website.YSCsessionThis cookies is set by Youtube and is used to track the views of embedded videos.
